item.title: Liked:An Indian soldier explains what Pakistani Soldiers think about Indian Army
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Liked: An Indian soldier explains what Pakistani Soldiers think about Indian Army

Indian army and Pakistan army have fought several wars with a proxy war going in Kashmir since 1990. We can think whatever we want to, but we actually donâ€™t know how soldiers behave when they get to interact with each other.

Srikanth Perinkulam
